signup.title: Create your account
signup.description: Join the community by filling out the details below. All fields are required.

password_reset.success_message: If an account exists for that identifier, we'll send password reset instructions.

magic_link.request_description: Enter your email and we'll send you a magic link to sign in.
magic_link.success_message: If an account with that email exists, a magic link has been sent.

totp.title: Authenticator App Setup
totp.intro: Use an authenticator app like Google Authenticator or Authy
totp.scan_instructions: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app
totp.enter_code: Enter the 6-digit code from your app
info_items: An authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, 1Password, etc.)
A few minutes to complete setup
totp.qr_alt: QR code for authenticator app setup
totp.scan_prompt: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app:
totp.manual_title: Can't scan? Enter this code manually:
totp.manual_help: Use this secret key if your authenticator app doesn't support QR codes

sms.title: Verify by SMS
sms.intro: Receive a verification code via text message. Use E.164 format (e.g. +15551234567).
sms.message: Check your phone for the verification code.
info_items: We send a 6-digit code via SMS.
Enter the code to enable SMS-based 2FA.
The SMS method becomes your default 2FA option.
sms.recovery_description: Save your recovery codes in a safe place in case you can't receive texts.

email.title: Verify by Email
email.intro: We will send a 6-digit verification code to your account email.
email.message: Check your inbox for the verification code.
info_items: We send a verification code to your primary email.
Enter the code to enable email-based 2FA.
The email method becomes your default 2FA option.
email.recovery_description: Save your recovery codes to keep access if you can't reach your email.

recovery.title: Recovery Codes
recovery.description: Save these recovery codes in a safe place. Each code can only be used once.
recovery.warning: These codes will only be shown once!
recovery.warning_body: These recovery codes can be used to access your account if you lose access to your authenticator app. Each code can only be used once.
important_items: Store these codes in a secure location (password manager, safe, etc.)
Each code can only be used once
Don't share these codes with anyone
You can generate new codes at any time (this will invalidate old ones)

trusted_devices.title: Trusted Devices
trusted_devices.description: Manage devices that can skip 2FA verification for 30 days.

remove_description.totp: Removing your authenticator app will unlink it from Tinybeans. Scan a new QR code if you decide to set it up again.
remove_description.sms: Removing SMS codes will delete your verified phone number. Re-run SMS setup if you want to use text messages again.
remove_description.email: Removing email verification will disable receiving verification codes via email. You can set it up again at any time.

settings.recovery_codes_description: Recovery codes can be used to access your account if you lose access to your authenticator device. Each code can only be used once.

disable.title: Disable Two-Factor Authentication
disable.description: Disabling 2FA will make your account less secure. You'll only need your password to log in.
disable.dialog_description: Enter your 6-digit verification code to confirm disabling 2FA. This will make your account less secure.
